issue.title: gall.dcinside.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://gall.dcinside.com/mgallery/board/lists?id=genrenovel](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgall.dcinside.com%2Fmgallery%2Fboard%2Flists%3Fid%3Dgenrenovel) ### Comment Username: @115dkk > 1. I have the same problem with all galleries (bulletin boards) on a site called dcinside. The gallery I specified in the link is just one example. > > 2. intermittently, when I try to access, refresh, enter a post/comment, etc., it just loads pointlessly and never completes, as if the browser is lagging. > > 3. In that state, I can't select any links, try to refresh again, or even hit back button to go back until I get to the new tab home. > > 4. like 'namu wiki', I have a suspicion that the company is intentionally making the site difficult to use if you have adblock enabled. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/npk3eowo1hws8880kw84k4oosw40wo0btj3rewqkjc.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/iw5zdzox51k4kgkwco0wwo0g4040k8o5umb8xhphjc.png?nc=1)

issue.title: trk.peace-fruit-wool-detail.run
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://trk.peace-fruit-wool-detail.run/gg/jz?to=https%3A%2F%2Fresidencepluck.com%2Ftsr2a9rwye%3Fkey%3D1d2bdfeaede324440ed74db9757f69d5%26psid%3D91cxa710-rcyf-4j7x-9415-4d348a478y10-tz3u%26clickid%3DoXvawEuXFYQ8izqm4XEfD9ow](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftrk.peace-fruit-wool-detail.run%2Fgg%2Fjz%3Fto%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fresidencepluck.com%252Ftsr2a9rwye%253Fkey%253D1d2bdfeaede324440ed74db9757f69d5%2526psid%253D91cxa710-rcyf-4j7x-9415-4d348a478y10-tz3u%2526clickid%253DoXvawEuXFYQ8izqm4XEfD9ow) ### Comment > SCAM domain. Tries to redirect to fake YouTube or casinos ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/gw0bvinn30o4k0480w40s0s4484k8wojow5esqwkh4.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | - Browser: | - Filters: | Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

comment.body:
Let's just block `://trk.*run^$document` right off the bat. Absolutely *nothing* good could result from such a URL pattern.

We should also block `residencepluck.com` and the other 8,000 domains hosted on its malware IPs: https://securitytrails.com/domain/residencepluck.com/dns

comment.body:
@115dkk

> 1. I have the same problem with all galleries (bulletin boards) on a site called dcinside. The gallery I specified in the link is just one example.

Can be reproduced with Microsoft default anti-virus.

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/98787049/bc6566a7-86fb-483a-b911-88c22795573d)

</details> 


> 2. intermittently, when I try to access, refresh, enter a post/comment, etc., it just loads pointlessly and never completes, as if the browser is lagging.
> 3. In that state, I can't select any links, try to refresh again, or even hit back button to go back until I get to the new tab home.

Please remove all anti-virus programs except Microsoft Defender.

> 4. like 'namu wiki', I have a suspicion that the company is intentionally making the site difficult to use if you have adblock enabled.

Did you mean dcinside?
